021import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
022import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.MiniMessage;
023import net.tnemc.core.currency.Denomination;
024
025import java.math.BigDecimal;
026import java.util.ArrayList;
027import java.util.LinkedList;
028import java.util.List;
029
030/**
031 * Represents a denomination for an {@link ItemCurrency currency}.
032 *
033 * @author creatorfromhell
034 * @see ItemCurrency
035 * @since 0.1.2.0
036 */
037public class ItemDenomination extends Denomination {
038
039  //Item Comparison checks to run
040  private final List<String> checks = new ArrayList<>();
041
042  //List relating to the itemModel setting
043  private final List<String> modelColours = new ArrayList<>();
044  private final List<Float> modelFloats = new ArrayList<>();
045  private final List<Boolean> modelBooleans = new ArrayList<>();
046  private final List<String> modelStrings = new ArrayList<>();
047
048  //Lists about item settings
049  private final List<String> enchantments = new ArrayList<>();
050  private final List<String> flags = new ArrayList<>();
051  private final List<Component> lore = new ArrayList<>();
052
053  private String material = "PAPER";
054  private short damage = 0;
055  private int maxStack = 0;
056  private String name = "";
057  private Integer customModel = -1;
058  private String texture = "";
059  private String provider = "vanilla";
060  private String providerID = "";
061
062  private String itemModel = "";
063
064
065  public ItemDenomination(final BigDecimal weight, final String material) {
066
067    this(weight, material, (short)0);
068  }
069
070  public ItemDenomination(final BigDecimal weight, final String material, final short damage) {
071
072    super(weight);
073    this.material = material;
074    this.damage = damage;
075  }
076
077  public ItemDenomination(final BigDecimal weight) {
078
079    super(weight);
080  }
081
082  public List<String> enchantments() {
083
084    return enchantments;
085  }
086
087  public void enchantments(final List<String> enchantments) {
088
089    this.enchantments.clear();
090    this.enchantments.addAll(enchantments);
091  }
092
093  public List<String> flags() {
094
095    return flags;
096  }
097
098  public void flags(final List<String> flags) {
099
100    this.flags.clear();
101    this.flags.addAll(flags);
102  }
103
104  public String material() {
105
106    return material;
107  }
108
109  public void material(final String material) {
110
111    this.material = material;
112  }
113
114  public short getDamage() {
115
116    return damage;
117  }
118
119  public void setDamage(final short damage) {
120
121    this.damage = damage;
122  }
123
124  public int maxStack() {
125
126    return maxStack;
127  }
128
129  public void maxStack(final int maxStack) {
130
131    this.maxStack = maxStack;
132  }
133
134  public String getName() {
135
136    return name;
137  }
138
139  public void setName(final String name) {
140
141    this.name = name;
142  }
143
144  public List<Component> getLore() {
145
146    return lore;
147  }
148
149  public void setLore(final List<Component> lore) {
150
151    this.lore.clear();
152    this.lore.addAll(lore);
153  }
154
155  public LinkedList<String> getLoreAsString() {
156
157    final LinkedList<String> loreAsString = new LinkedList<>();
158    for(final Component component : lore) {
159
160      loreAsString.add(MiniMessage.miniMessage().serialize(component));
161    }
162    return loreAsString;
163  }
164
165  public int getCustomModel() {
166
167    return customModel;
168  }
169
170  public void setCustomModel(final int customModel) {
171
172    this.customModel = customModel;
173  }
174
175  public String getTexture() {
176
177    return texture;
178  }
179
180  public void setTexture(final String texture) {
181
182    this.texture = texture;
183  }
184
185  public List<String> checks() {
186
187    return checks;
188  }
189
190  public String providerID() {
191
192    return providerID;
193  }
194
195  public void providerID(final String providerID) {
196
197    this.providerID = providerID;
198  }
199
200  public String provider() {
201
202    return provider;
203  }
204
205  public void provider(final String provider) {
206
207    this.provider = provider;
208  }
209
210  public List<String> modelColours() {
211
212    return modelColours;
213  }
214
215  public List<Float> modelFloats() {
216
217    return modelFloats;
218  }
219
220  public List<Boolean> modelBooleans() {
221
222    return modelBooleans;
223  }
224
225  public List<String> modelStrings() {
226
227    return modelStrings;
228  }
229
230  public String itemModel() {
231
232    return itemModel;
233  }
234
235  public void itemModel(final String itemModel) {
236
237    this.itemModel = itemModel;
238  }
239}
